images.title: Every day is a play day!
images.caption: World Children's Day
images.desc: Children are the future and ensuring their well-being is fundamental to a thriving society. World Children's Day marks the day in 1989 that the UN General Assembly adopted the Convention on the Rights of the Child, an international treaty setting out children's rights all over the world.
images.bsTitle: Every day is a play day!
